question: Tolong dong buatin monologue berbahasa inggris tentang museum , pake opening sama closing juga .. :D

answers.answer: Hi all, today I would like to share with all of you why I really in love with Museum, Why do I love with it? First, Museum keeps all the civilization history of human being, from thousand years ago. When I went to my first museum, namely Louvre in Paris, I felt like I walked from 5000 years ago to recent moment. Second, Museum teach us how to be wise, it is due to the ability of Museum in conveying the story about war and its wisdom behind it. After all I recommend you to go to museum as often as possible.

related_questions.question:
Fill in the blanks with the past tense of the verbs
we not take our passports

answers.answer:
we didn't take our passports?

we not took our passports

rumus : s + did + not + v1 + o
we didn't take our passports / we did not take our passports

related_questions.question:
Pada saat lagu Call Me Maybe milik Charly Rae Jepsen, ada lirik: "Before You Came Into My Life"    kenapa menggunakan Came, bukan Come??
padahal kan itu artinya belum terjadi dan tidak bisa menggunakan Past Tense??

answers.answer: karna itu masa lampau jd pake camen came verb brp?

Lirik itu bentuk past tense, cara melihat kalimat itu tenses apa ada 2 cara yaitu: keterangan waktu & kata kerjanya. Lirik itu termasuk dalam recount text. Si penyanyi menyanyikan lagu tentang masa lalunya.

Come adalah kata kerja tidak beraturan (irregular verbs). Bentuk kata kerja keduanya adalah came.


semoga bisa membantu ^_^,,,
maaf jika ada yang salah ^_^,,,
jika ada yang tidak dimengerti dari jawaban di atas, silahkan ditanyakan ^_^,,,

" A Spot Of Pneumonia

On Christmas Eve I first started feeling short of breath and on Friday the 27th I decided I couldn't ignore it anymore so I told mum and dad, I need to go to hospital and they willingly obliged.

On the 27th, they found the there was fluid on the other (the right) side (compared with the left). There wasn't as much fluid as there was last time so they drained it and I was allowed to go home

I was meant to be flying up to Waiheke Island and staying in this most stunning house which won house of the year for 2013! We were also meant to be staying with Jannie and Frank who are some of my favorite people in the world.

I decided that I still wanted to go but flying was out of the question so this time I made the other parent drive me to Auckland so dad obligingly did so. Aren't I lucky!

I made it up there but by that evening I wasn't feeling well and my oral antibiotics just weren't seeming to work. However we had missed the last ferry and had to wait til the morning and during this time dad put together an idea.

So the next day we trotted off to see the Waiheke GP and he gave me antibiotics which had to be given twice daily as antibiotics into my bum. About as nice as it sounds.

It actually seemed to work, I felt a bit better and my temp went down but it didn't last so by the 1st it was apparent I needed to go to the hospital. However I decided I didn't want to go to Auckland, so both parents did an almighty dash with me in the back in the car to here, Wellington hospital.

minum = drink (v1) dringking (continuous)
menanam = plant (v1) planted (verb2) planting (continuous)

related_questions.question: Carikan saya pekerjaan dan ruangan yang ada di restaurant dalam bahasa inggris mohon cepaaaaaaaaaat

tanpa cahaya / matahari tumbuhan tidak bisa berfotosintesiis

answers.answer:
plants need light to photosynthesize 
without light / solar plants can not photosynthesize
plants need light to photosynthesize without light / solar plants can not photosynthesize

related_questions.question: Contoh narative text pendek tentang hewan dan terjemahan nya?

answers.answer:
Story of Venus and the Cat
A Cat fell in love with a handsome young man, and begged the goddess Venus to change her into a woman. Venus was very gracious about it, and changed her at once into a beautiful maiden, whom the young man fell in love with at first sight and shortly afterwards married. One day Venus thought she would like to see whether the Cat had changed her habits as well as her form; so she let a mouse run loose in the room where they were. Forgetting everything, the young woman had no sooner seen the mouse than up she jumped and was after it like a shot: at which the goddess was so disgusted that she changed her back again into a Cat.

Terjemahannya :
Cerita Venus dan Kucing
Suatu ketika,seekor kucing jatuh cinta dengan seorang pemuda tampan, dan memohon dewi Venus untuk mengubah dirinya menjadi seorang wanita. Dewi Venus menerima permintaan tersebut, dan seketika mengubah dirinya menjadi seorang gadis cantik dimana pemuda tersebut langsung jatuh cinta pada pandangan pertama dan tak lama kemudian mereka menikah. Suatu hari dewi Venus berpikir melihat apakah seekor kucing itu telah berubah kebiasaan serta bentuk nya, Maka dewi Venus menizinkan seekor tikus berjalan santai di suatu ruang di mana mereka berada. Seketika itu pula gadis cantik itu melupakan semuanya dan melompat ke arah tikus dengan sangat cepat. Hal ini membuat dewi Venus merasa begitu jijik dan merubahnya kembali menjadi seekor kucing.

related_questions.question: Explain about vehicle in english language

answers.answer: vehicle is kind of tools that was made by human being. it is for human mobility or usually called transportation. vehicle include of bicycle, motorcycle, plane, ship etc
vehicle is kind of thing that make human can travel for shorten time.vehicle made by human.vehicles including planes,ships,cars,etc.
